fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Lull someone to sleep each night.

- Once per game, you may instead serenade the town at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players will know that they were lulled to sleep.

- When you lull someone to sleep, you will remove all notifications from them. This does not include death messages.

- You cannot lull the same person to sleep two nights in a row.

- When you serenade the town, you will stop the following day phase from happening.

- You may only serenade the town once.
